sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">674b5ba6d59f4110e6ceb623d8684b61</macroponent><name>Refresh Page</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.event * @param {any} params.imports * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers */ function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) { api.setState('listRefresh', {timestamp: Date.now()}) }]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DLADMIN</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-13 16:03:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2f7293fbdb57c510f20205d2ca961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh Page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Wage Adjustments" source="x_shce_wage_adjust">ac2493da1b9a9810a649ece66e4bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Wage Adjustments">ac2493da1b9a9810a649ece66e4bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2f7293fbdb57c510f20205d2ca961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DLADMIN</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-13 16:04:45</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
